text: Kafi waqt bitaya tere sath. As a roomie bhi. 2 courses me pass krvaya tune, tera nam itihas me likha jaega.Kafi helpful hai tu.  stithi sahi hone k bad chlte hai goa trip pe.  Jis din jyada hi khush ho to chess.com pe a ajana ðŸ˜‰.

text: Genuinely kuchh likhne ka man kr rha hai. Pdhai se jyada T-shirt churane vale kisse se yaad rkhe jaoge tum. Intelligency aur soberness jesi tum me dono qualities hai jo ki bahut rare hai.  Tum se jyada brilliant meri contact list me  door-door tak dusra koi nhi hai. IAS bnne k bad bhi sobriety maintain rkhna. Sthiti sahi hone k bad chalte hai ghumne kahi.
author: Vivek  Verma

text: Rakesh mere bhai. Mera business partner.
author: Vivek  Verma

text: My first ever friend of IITK.  Tumhari googly ne mujhe bahut pareshan kia. Umda bowler ho tum. kismat ne chaha to fir milege.
author: Vivek  Verma

text: 8 years of friendship and still counting.
author: Vivek  Verma

text: Mera fraudy bhai. Khushi hai ki tu andhbhakt nahi hai.
author: Vivek  Verma
